Method Detail

run

public void run()

handleCommand

private void handleCommand(java.lang.String cmdLine)
The handleCommand methods handles all possible commands entered into the command line. The put and get request is passed to the KVStore-Library, which handles serialization and sending of the message.

Parameters:
cmdLine - The latest command line input

connect

private void connect(java.lang.String address,
                     int port)
Calls the connect method of KVStore

Parameters:
address - IPV4 address of the server
port - port that the server listens on
Throws:
java.net.UnknownHostException - IP address not valid/reachable
java.io.IOException

handleNewMessage

public void handleNewMessage(TextMessage msg)
Handles incoming messages on the client. Prints msg after the PROMT String.

Specified by:
handleNewMessage in interface ClientSocketListener

handleStatus

public void handleStatus(ClientSocketListener.SocketStatus status)
Handles the socket status if it is disconnected or connection lost. Informs the user about it.

Specified by:
handleStatus in interface ClientSocketListener

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Main entry point for the echo server application.

Parameters:
